sentences.en: Ann thought it unseemly to kiss her husband in public.
sentences.cn: 安认为当众亲她丈夫不太得体。

sentences.en: At first I thought such cheer unseemly.
sentences.cn: 起初,我觉得这种快乐不合时宜.

sentences.en: Avoid anything unseemly more from regard for your own self - respect than from fear of external authority.
sentences.cn: 避免不得体的言行,这倒不是因为怕别人的苛评,而是因为你自己就有诚惶诚恐的谨慎心理.

sentences.en: Eroticism was, in some way , dangerous business , unseemly to his way of thinking.
sentences.cn: 性感这东西对他说来是危险的, 在他的思想方法中是不体面的.

sentences.en: Everyone was shocked by his unseemly conduct.
sentences.cn: 大家都被他不得体的举动震惊了.

sentences.en: Her behaviour at the party last night was unseemly.
sentences.cn: 他每晚都和朋友们饮酒.

sentences.en: His language was most unseemly , ieabusive.
sentences.cn: 他的话很不得当(出言不逊).

sentences.en: How unseemly are these weak and slender feet!
sentences.cn: 这几只无力而细长的脚是多么不相称!

sentences.en: It was unseemly to yield to such pressure.
sentences.cn: 要是屈服于这种压力,那是不体面的.

sentences.en: It would be unseemly for judges to receive pay increases when others are having to tighten their belts.
sentences.cn: 在其他人正不得不勒紧裤腰带的时候，给法官提高薪水是不合适的。

sentences.en: Pundits predict some unseemly scrambling within Likud in the days ahead for the jobs still remaining.
sentences.cn: 实际上,亚阿龙先生是没得选了.

sentences.en: Yet despite this unseemly outpouring, the biggest problem of all - mental health - remains tight shut.
sentences.cn: 不过,尽管有上述种种不得体的言谈, 但对于最重要的问题 —— 心理健康 —— 人们仍守口如瓶.

sentences.en: Your levity is unseemly at this time.
sentences.cn: 在这种场合,你的轻率举动是不得体的.

trans.tran_cn: （举止）不得体的，不合时宜的，易遭非议的
trans.tran_en: unseemly behaviour is not polite or not suitable for a particular occasion
